title: A mathematical model of vaccine hesitancy: Analysing the impact of political trends and the interaction across age and education groups in the USA
summary: This paper presents a mathematical model to investigate the impact of social interaction on vaccine hesitancy, focusing on temporal transitions between vaccination classes across age and education groups in the USA.
usefulness_reason: The paper discusses "temporal transitions" and social interaction across population groups, which relates to "Spatio Temporal" and "Contextual dataset". However, it does not explicitly mention "Point Process" or "Survey data".
